tool_description: Collects and aggregates survey responses from all distribution channels, providing unified response data with source attribution and quality validation.

survey_id.description: Survey identifier to collect responses for

response_validation.description: Whether to validate response quality and completeness

duplicate_handling.description: How to handle duplicate responses: keep_first, keep_last, merge

error_messages: Invalid survey ID: survey_id does not exist or is not accessible for response collection.
Invalid collection channels: Use supported channels [email, sms, web, mobile_push].
Duplicate handling invalid: Use one of [keep_first, keep_last, merge] for duplicate_handling parameter.
usage: Provide survey_id to start collecting responses. Optionally specify collection_channels to limit data sources and configure response_validation and duplicate_handling for data quality control.

collection_id.description: Unique identifier for the collection session

responses_by_channel.description: Response count breakdown by distribution channel
